mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sms_access_id AS "smsAccessId", a.sms_access_key AS "smsAccessKey", a.sms_mns_endpoint AS "smsMnsEndpoint", a.sms_topic AS "smsTopic", a.sms_sign_name AS "smsSignName"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO config_sms( id, sms_access_id, sms_access_key, sms_mns_endpoint, sms_topic, sms_sign_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{smsAccessId}, #{smsAccessKey}, #{smsMnsEndpoint}, #{smsTopic}, #{smsSignName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE config_sms SET sms_access_id = #{smsAccessId}, sms_access_key = #{smsAccessKey}, sms_mns_endpoint = #{smsMnsEndpoint}, sms_topic = #{smsTopic}, sms_sign_name = #{smsSignName} WHERE id = #{id}
